text:
While most of ant.bat has quotes around environment variables, the few last 
lines are missing them. It affect the code run in the :runAnt 
and :runAntWithJikes labels. It should look like this:

:runAnt
"%_JAVACMD%" -classpath "%LOCALCLASSPATH%" -Dant.home="%ANT_HOME%" %ANT_OPTS% 
org.apache.tools.ant.Main %ANT_CMD_LINE_ARGS%
goto end

:runAntWithJikes
"%_JAVACMD%" -classpath "%LOCALCLASSPATH%" -Dant.home="%ANT_HOME%" "-
Djikes.class.path=%JIKESPATH%" %ANT_OPTS% org.apache.tools.ant.Main %
ANT_CMD_LINE_ARGS%
creator: atzur@randomwalk.com
conor@apache.org
text: All the path type env variables should now be quoted.
